issues.description:
Stolen bicycle.  Powder blue bicycle, with cream colored, balloon tires, and a coffee cup holder, on the handlebar.
I saw this bicycle, yesterday, around 1:00pm, locked outside of the Yale SOM, on Whitney Ave.  Then, around 5:15 pm, I see the same bicycle, with a young (12-13 years old), black male, riding the same bike, cutting across route 34, in front of rush hour traffic, with his two friends.  Last seen heading West, on Washington Ave. at Cedar St.   So, if the bike is yours, take a ride down Washington Ave., you might find your bike...

issues.description: This is a stretch of about a 1/4 mile between where Montgomery/Marshalee intersect and rockburn park that doesn't have a sidewalk. A sidewalk, or at least a bike lane, would be very helpful here. There are many walkers, joggers and bikers on this stretch of road; the shoulder is maybe a couple inches wide at best and the cars drive dangerously fast, much above the speed limit. Making this stretch of road more pedestrian friendly would be very beneficial, especially with the park, bike trails and schools so close.
